species.name: shinx
descriptions: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.
Electricity makes this Pokémon’s fur glow. Shinx sends signals to others of its kind by shaking the tip of its tail while the tail tip is shining brightly.
Its forelegs have a muscle-based system of generating electricity. Its body shines if endangered.
Shakes its body to generate electricity. Its stature belies its aggression—one must be patient to tame this Pokémon.
The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.

abilities.name: rivalry
abilities.effect: Increases damage inflicted to 1.25× against Pokémon of the same gender, but decreases damage to 0.75× against the opposite gender.

abilities.name: intimidate
abilities.effect: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

abilities.name: guts
abilities.effect: Increases Attack to 1.5× with a major status ailment.
